issue.description: Implement the fundamental messaging functionality for the ChatCpp application, including message creation, serialization, storage, and basic communication protocols.
acceptance_criteria: Messages can be created with username and content
Messages can be serialized to/from string format

comments.author: product-owner
comments.body: This epic covers the minimum viable product features for messaging. We need to ensure reliable message delivery and proper error handling.

comments.author: tech-lead
comments.body: Architecture decision: Using WebSocket for real-time communication with JSON message format. OpenSSL for secure connections.
